    • setMainController

      public void setMainController(MainController main)
      Stores main controller for future use
      Parameters:
      main - the main application layout controller

    • initialize

      void initialize()
      This method is called to initialize controller after root element has been processed. The choices for quantity and size are set. Default value of coffee size is set to short, default quantity is set to 1, and total to 1.69.
